text: On the eve of Venom ‘ s digital release ( Blu - ray and DVD on December 18th ), Sony Pictures has unleashed a never - before - seen deleted scene of Eddie Brock unleashing his inner demon. Coming to us by way of Twitter ( h / t CBM ), this is by no means the full deleted scene, and has instead been edited so that fans are left wanting that little bit more. Nevertheless, it offers a pretty good look at the sinister symbiote being triggered by a car alarm – much to the amazement of a young kid, who can do nothing but gawk at Venom as the inky - black monster makes short work of the doomed automobile. Feast thy eyes : This particular snippet is one of three deleted / extended scenes set to be included on the
